column4: does anyone here use gnome-terminal with screen?  ctrl+left and ctrl+right doesnt work when i'm in a screen session
to switch between different screens? Use ctrl-a n and ctrl-a p

not to switch between screens, but to jump over words in the terminal.  for example, i always use ctrl+left to jump one word to the left when i'm editing in the command line.  if i use screen with a gnome-terminal, ctrl+left just emits the letter "D"
